subject: Pedal haptics not working with iracing
description_text:
I recently ordered VAM Pro plus pedal haptics and a Plus X control box for
my husband's Simsonn pedals. The pedals work fine when he is using the
Simsonn app but iracing is not recognizing the pedals. We need help
figuring out what the issue is and have exhausted all resources we could
find online. Please help!

conversations.body_text: Hi Christie Cook,  You can update SIMSONN Manager to the latest version 2.1.0 and try the iRacing telemetry, or alternatively use SIMHUB 9.9.3. I’ve attached our telemetry support list for your reference.      https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download
